Body:
"""Test is_volume_in_storage_group True result legacy vol create."""
storage_group_name = self.create_empty_storage_group()
device_id = self.provisioning.create_volume_from_sg_return_dev_id(self.
    generate_name(), storage_group_name, 1)
time.sleep(10)
self.addCleanup(self.delete_volume, storage_group_name, device_id)
result = self.provisioning.is_volume_in_storage_group(device_id,
    storage_group_name)
self.assertIsInstance(result, bool)
self.assertTrue(result)
